title: ISADORA, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE AND NANO CRYSTAL EMERALD SILVER RIVIÈRE NECKLACE
description: Isadora features a graduating silhouette of lab-grown white sapphires and nano crystal emeralds, set in 4-prong sterling silver.
details:
Metal: Sterling silver

Setting: 4-prong 
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire and nano crystal emerald 
Stone Shape: Round cut

16 inches, 14.5 CTW DEW lab-grown white sapphire, 3 CTW DEW nano crystal emerald
